Rowdy Wolf:








Rowdy Wolf nodded to Zyber. He transformed to his beast mode, the 
short-legged dire wolf. He kept his ears up and lead the way to the location 
of his cave. "It's not so far. Only about a qaurter of a klick from here." 
He trod up boulders and across hill tops.
